original_text: You are the people that make us very happy! We know that you will continue to trust God. So, when our Lord Jesus returns, we will be proud of you. You will be like a crown that he gives us when we stand in front of him.
korean_text: 우리의 소망이나 기쁨이나 자랑의 면류관이 무엇이냐 그가 강림하실 때 우리 주 예수 앞에 너희가 아니냐

sentences.original_text: that you will continue to trust God.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들이 계속해서 하나님을 믿을 것이라는 것을.

sentences.original_text: So, when our Lord Jesus returns,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로, 우리 주 예수님께서 돌아오실 때,

sentences.original_text: we will be proud of you.
You will be like a crown
when we stand in front of him.
